Namrata Purohit 20 Stott Pilates Instructor Abhishek Nayar, Manandeep Singh, Neha Dhupia, Hazel Keech, Shibani Dandekar, Bruna Abdullah I am a sports enthusiast who loves adventure. I love the outdoors and am an avid animal lover. I'm happy, funny and simply crazy (at least that's what people say). Hermione Granger. Like her, I'm confident and loyal to those I love. Mainly, I am one tough cookie. Since I don't watch TV, I am going to go with popular opinion here — McSteamy from Grey's Anatomy. My friends tell me he's hot. Intelligence and wit. A dress. I just love dresses. If I had the chance, (the late) Steve Irwin. I would love to know more about his adventures. Spaghetti Aglio Olio. It's good to have a cheat day. I played football for my school and college. I love watching it and find it faster than cricket. London, because it is London. Good food, lovely parks, the best shops, the parties... I love it. I was a good girl and took my parents to dinner. Jurassic Park. I imagine myself finding dinosaurs some day.
